exceptions.exn: In environment d : dstatelet n : nid x : heap y : soup V : valid (dstate d) The term "dstate d" has type "lstate_type heap" while it is expected to have type "is_true (valid (?x \\+ ?y))".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

exceptions.tactic: rewrite (getLocalU n n d y V H).
exceptions.exn: In environment d : dstatelet n : nid x : heap y : soup V : valid (dstate d) H : n \\in dom (dstate d) The term "n" has type "nid" while it is expected to have type "soup".

original: intros V. assert (n \in dom (dstate d)). - apply (validL (dstate d) (upd n x (dstate d))). auto. - rewrite (getLocalU n n d y V H). unfold upd. simpl. auto.
